name: HammerFall
description:
Description: Project in development as part of the Mastered Skills Bootcamp. Fight off hordes of enemies with your hammer! Smash them into the environment for extra damage! Face waves of enemies in an arena or defend the castle for as long as you can!

Controls (Mouse & Keyboard): 

Use WASD in combination with your mouse to move and look around.

Left/Right mouse buttons swing your hammer left and right respectively.

R restarts the level.

Esc quits back to the main menu.

After playing, please consider filling in this questionnaire.
